00067     inline void putNum() { oldnums.push_back(num);  }
00068     inline unsigned takeNum() { 
00069         if (newnums.size()) {
00070             num = newnums.front(); 
00071             newnums.pop_front(); 
00072             return num;
00073         } else if (oldnums.size()) {
00074             num = oldnums.front(); 
00075             oldnums.pop_front();
00076             return num; 
00077         } // else...
00078         Error() << "INTERNAL ERROR: takeNum() ran out of numbers!";
00079         return 0;
00080     }

00082         unsigned num;
00083         if (oldnums.size()) {
00084             num = oldnums.front();
00085             oldnums.pop_front();
00086             newnums.push_back(num);
00087             return num;
00088         } // else...
00089         Error() << "INTERNAL ERROR: newFrameNum() ran out of numbers in oldnums!";
00090         return 0;
